comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Now that's a challenge. Thanks to the wonderful baseball historians there are few unidentified people in the baseball photographs in this series.

comment.author: 27217020@N00
comment._content: Ed Sweeney caught 112 games for the Yankees that year, followed by Dick Gossett with 38, Joe Smith with 14, Bob Williams 6, Bill Reynolds 5, and Dutch Sterrett and Harry Hanson caught one game each. www.baseball-reference.com/teams/NYY/1913-roster.shtml
